title: There´s no usable keystone for Singed with Runes Reforged

replies.body:
The new Phase Rush sounds so OP on singed. 

One fling + w + q proc = a shit load more MS for an already hard to catch champion along with slow resist.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-update/8300-8326?build=41122224

This seems like it would be pretty good to me.  Depending on what the last inspiration keystone is, it could be better.

Electrocute/phase rush..if an enemy has your Q on them, auto+e chunks them or gives you a burst of speed worth slow resist.

Potentially grasp for lanes you can't proxy.

Predator helps his engage.

Arcane comet has some potential - something else to distract anyone trying to chase you.

Glacial Augment has a lot of potential to make you stickier/more slippery - and singed already likes Righteous Glory.

Summoner specialist could turn out to be ridiculous for smite or exhaust and swap to teleport or flash - or not. It's really hard to read that one.

It's true that there's no definitive "Must Take" for him like there are for other champs - but he's far from the only champion with weird options.
Go predator and zoom into teamfights
